## PCA analysis

source("../99_proj_func.R")

prostate_data_imputed \<- prostate_data_augment \|\>

select_if(is.numeric) \|\>

mutate_all(mean_impute)

```{r}
library(broom)
```

```{r}
prostate_data_augment <-prostate_data_augment |>
  filter(!is.na(age))
```

```{r}
library(broom)  # devtools::install_github("tidymodels/broom")
pca_fit <- prostate_data_augment |>
  select(`Treatment regime`,stage,`Age group`, `Serum haemoglobin level`, `History of CVD`)|>
  prcomp(scale = TRUE) 
```

```{r}
pca_fit |>
  augment(prostate_data_augment) %>% # add original dataset back in
  ggplot(aes(.fittedPC2, .fittedPC3)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1.5)
```
